title: [Large-Scale] Collaborative Learning-Based Educational System Design for Improving K-12 Student Performance

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Theory Knowledge and Understanding of Educational System Design Concepts
context.additional_context: A project-based course where university students analyze core design elements of the K-12 education system and develop improvement plans applying collaborative learning strategies

learning_goals: Learners can apply the nine validated core design elements (collaborative learning, extended learning time, classroom environment, etc.) to real-world case analyses in K-12 educational settings
Learners can develop an educational system design framework based on collaborative learning theory and propose strategies for improving student performance
Enhance effective collaboration skills with peers while performing team-based problem-solving projects in a blended learning environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
